item.description:
Greetings all,

I'm pirating this shamelessly from the East Hampstead Kayaking Group I joined - It is a great opportunity for ANYONE interested in trying Kayaking (different ones/types/etc) to do so for free!! Can't beat that!
It will probably be raining, but this event is for people who love getting wet ;)

Please Join us for a day of fun trying out differnt types of boats and paddles.

Contoocook's 8th Annual on water Demo day is Sunday MAY 17TH.

ALL CANOES AND KAYAKS WILL BE ON SALE.

LARGEST ON WATER DEMO IN NEW HAMPSHIRE.

COME OUT AND TRY AS MANY CANOES AND KAYAKS AS YOU WANT. OVER 200 BOATS WILL BE AVAILABLE TO DEMO INCLUDING PADDLES BY WARNER AND BENDING BRANCHES

HOURS 10:00AM TO 4:00PM.

MANUFACTURES ATTENDING:

OLD TOWN, WILDERNESS SYSTEMS, CURRENT DESIGN, OCEAN, NECKY, PERCEPTION, DAGGER, EDDYLINE, IMPEX, BOREAL, VALLEY, WENONAH, BELL, MAD RIVER

OUR GUEST SPEAKER THIS YEAR IS SUZANNE HUTCHINSON, NORTHEAST REP. FOR KOKATAT WATERSPORTS WEAR.

TOPIC: WHAT TO WEAR IN DIFFERENT PADDLING CONDITIONS. PRESENTION STARTS AT 1:00PM
item.how_to_find_us: Spot me or hit my cell phone (603) 557-6055
item.name: Contoocook River Canoe Co. On-Water DEMO DAY!
